message.body: Hey Sarah! I know you're busy but I was wondering if you have a few minutes I could talk to you and get your advice...I want to email a prof who showed triggering stuff but I'm not sure how to go about it. Totally cool if you don't have time though! :)
I don't have time tonight, but I should have time before my writing shift tomorrow. Shall we meet at 7:15ish?
Ermmm preferably not my room cause Anna is working here. Your suite? We could snag Zubrow/Magill early?
Zubrow writing center. Leaving Lloyd now!
And ignore that exclamation point. Not trying to rush you
I'm sorry I just left Lloyd I'm on my way!
Not only did my prof apologize eloquently, she also just sent out a sensitive trigger warning on next week's materials :D
